recipesJson.name: TF BY (Tuney Fruit Banana Yogurt)
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
A Strawberry Banana Kiwi Yogurt.
Sweeten to Taste.
I honestly wanted to make a tasty, basic, shake and vape recipe based on the profile picture I stumbled across while on Wendy Vapes Moist Monday.
It's smooth and tasty right off the shake the strawberry will come out a bit more at the three day mark while the kiwi will settle into more of a mid note.

Be beautiful to each other, educate, advocate, be good for this community!
